Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.repositories

Interface ContactRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ContactEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ContactEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<ContactEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<ContactEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ContactEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<ContactEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ContactEntity,Long>
@Repository public interface ContactRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ContactEntity,Long>
Repository interface for managing ContactEntity entities.

Extends JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations for contact types.

  • Method Details

    • findByValue

      Optional<ContactEntity> findByValue(String value)
      Finds a ContactEntity by its value (e.g., email or phone number).
      Parameters:
      value - the contact value to search for
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found ContactEntity, or empty if not found

    • findByActive

      List<ContactEntity> findByActive(boolean active)
      Retrieves all contacts from the database with the specified active status.
      Parameters:
      active - boolean indicating whether to retrieve active or inactive contacts.
      Returns:
      a list of contacts where the field 'active' matches the specified status.

    • findByValueContainingIgnoreCase

      List<ContactEntity> findByValueContainingIgnoreCase(String value)
      Retrieves contacts based on a search term.
      Parameters:
      value - the search term.
      Returns:
      a list of contacts that meet the condition.

    • findByContactType

      List<ContactEntity> findByContactType(ContactType contactType)
      Retrieves all contacts from the database by their contact type.
      Parameters:
      contactType - the contact type to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of contacts that match the given contact type
